channel.title: Weapon attack emote?
channel.description: Like u would search this getStandAnim() to find out the stance for a weapon. But what would i search for a weapons attack style. Example: Stance-hold gs on shoulder, Attack style/emote-hits the gs over his head and smashes it on the floor. How would i change that emote to a diffrent one i like (the attack style one)

item.title: Weapon attack emote?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

So after u added cocas new weapon stance how does ur Gs attack? does it vanish then reappear after it has hit?

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon attack emote?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

You have to make an entirely new emote.

This is a 317 server, NOT A 474-544.

Read full topic
